website_summaries.verdict: Reliable, easy-to-use clipper set with options for smaller and larger clippers.
pros: Customers appreciate the quality and fast results provided by this clipper
cons: May not provide as clean a cut as some other clippers

customer_reviews.title: One out of two... 😂
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost a similar pair so I ordered these as replacement. When I unboxed them the smaller pair of clippers wouldn't even close all the way and when I finally forced them Shut the blades didn't meet in anyway that would be able to cleanly cut a nail... Let alone a wiggly baby nail. Then larger d shaped set are perfect. I just threw away the smaller set. Lame. It would be nice to have a backup
customer_reviews.author: Thingslikechem

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got these as I find it can be hard for me to hold normal nail clippers. I LOVE that they leave my nail smooth where I clip it. Some nail clippers seem to leave a slightly rough edge (almost like they cut at a funny angle), but these never do that! The one slightly annoying bit is that sometimes when I'm flipping the green bit (to trim or put them away) the little piece holding it on pops out. It's super easy to fix though and I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: travel the world

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality clippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of baby nail clippers when my now toddler was a baby, a few years ago. They were awesome! In fact the whole family loved them and we even used them on adult nails lol. But they eventually wore down and rusted so I ordered these clippers, by the same brand as the ones I loved. These do not compare at all. These are cheap, weak, aren’t sharp enough to clip a baby nail. The quality of these is far less than the ones I bought 2 years ago. Would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Emely

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Pro- great for babies. Easy to use. Con- the second your baby is a curious toddler, like even just 14 mos old, he will take these apart. Mine did and we’ve literally gone through 3 different packs. They can be reassembled with minimal effort ONLY if the small metal piece holding the whole thing together doesn’t get lost. The piece is also easily swallowed, which wasn’t an issue for us but could be for some families. This is solved by keeping the clippers away from the tot, which is much easier said than done.
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: The BEST nail clippers EVER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these nail clippers! They come in a pack of two: one for fingers and one for toes. Both cut so well. I was using the safety first clippers that cane with a grooming kit and they were always hard to cut through my son’s nails. I purchased these because someone recommended them to me and I wish I had done it sooner. Now it’s a lot quicker to clip my baby’s nails. I tried on one of my fingernails and it also clipped so easily. I’ll have to order a set for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Moe21

customer_reviews.title: One is not bad but the other one is useless.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know which one is for adult or infant. They both look same to me but the one with the loop handle is easier to clip. I tried that one to my toddler and it was not bad. The other one sucks. The blade of the other one is not sharp at all and doesn't give a clean cut and doesn't work for adults. It bothers me that both make clicking sound right after I clip nails too.
customer_reviews.author: KandA

customer_reviews.title: Larger one great for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this set a few times over the years.. the infant clippers were good, but the thing I really like is that the larger pair is perfect for elementary-age kids - good clippers for them are surprisingly hard to find. I wish they were sold separately (because I know longer need the infant clippers) but for $4 total it’s still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cut the tip of my baby's finger off! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cut the tip of my baby's finger off! I used it on a long finger nail and barely went on it and she started screaming. I look down and there was blood everywhere. Way too sharp to be baby clippers!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Mason

customer_reviews.title: The larger ones are the best
customer_reviews.text: The larger clippers are my favorite. I haven't been able to find any other clippers that work as well on my little ones soft nails. I started using them on her when she was about 2 months old. This is actually my second pair and I can't stand using any other clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: 2 sizes- bigger one is best
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that this comes in a two pack with different handles (if that’s even what they are called on a nail clipper). The bigger one works best for me on a regular basis. It’s easier for me to maneuver and cut the baby’s nails. It gives me more confidence when I trim her nails. The smaller ones are good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp, doesn't cut well.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were the same clippers I had bought when my 3 year old was born, they look the same but they are very poor quality. These are so dull it doesn't leave a nice smooth cut. It leaves a rough cut on the nail. Similar to the difference of folding paper and tearing it as opposed to cutting it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Volleyball girl

customer_reviews.title: Something about the plastic handle isn't quite as nice of a feel as my old al metal ones ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the same pair of clipper for years - a simple, all metal kind but they were lost so I went on the hunt for a new set. I have used both of these now and tend to pick the smaller of the two (the one without the loop) to clip my 18 mo baby's nails. They cut well. Something about the plastic handle isn't quite as nice of a feel as my old al metal ones but I like these.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy these again. They didn’t cut
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received these. They didn’t work. I had watched the video and they looked awesome. But they would not clip. The company did give me a refund so I’m grateful for that. I don’t know if mine were faulty or they just aren’t made well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinegal

customer_reviews.title: I bought it two times
customer_reviews.text: first time it lasts very long since my baby was born until he is older than 15months. and for this price, nothing can beat it. second time the main clipper broke the day we got it.... by my boy... who was about 16month... anyway... very mixed feeling
customer_reviews.author: Yun

customer_reviews.title: These nail clippers are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I had a pair that came with a kit and accidently broke them. I was so happy to find them sold individually! The handle keeps it securely in my fingers while I clip my son's nails and none of the other baby clippers have a handle like this. My 4 month old son's nails have to be clipped every other day and I love love love these clippers! I bought two to have a back-up. Ive seen several reviewers complain about them breaking, but they come apart and can be put back together. They aren't broken, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my 13 month old. Have been using them to cut his nails since he was born. They are not as sharp as standard nail clippers (work fine on babies paper thin nails), so they are safer and help prevent cuts if you accidentally clip to far.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Best kind I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I purchased of these. The first one I got in the store about 3 years ago. We finally lost them somewhere in the house for good so I bought more. Both easy to use and not so baby proof they don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Francis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the price. Sadly, one of the clippers fell apart after clipping one nail. Luckily, I was paying close attention to the items pieces and my little one didn't find any!
customer_reviews.author: cmDaffy

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: These are not the greatest. Doesn’t cut well and handle falls to the side as your clipping. Cutting kids nails is hard enough as it is. Buy a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: It felt cheaply made and it was considering it broke after 2 uses. It's difficult to hold and it also didn't cut my daughters nails very well. It's not sharp enough and you have to press down so hard to cut anything, with a squirmy baby that's not a good or safe thing. I bought something different to replace this and I'm much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lina

customer_reviews.title: Weak blades do not cut cleanly through the nail for ...
customer_reviews.text: Weak blades do not cut cleanly through the nail for a smooth finish. My sons nails were left all jagged and needed filing once I was done. The spring mechanism is also very weak feeling. These are going in the trash. Pity.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl M. com

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite clippers. I’ve gotten to use at least 4-5 different brands and I always go back to these. Makes it way easier to me.
customer_reviews.author: MoG

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s looks good and easy to use . Easy to use for small kids without any problem . Broke after 2 month of use . But over all good and nice
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: We bought these after my in-laws threw out our loved Freidababy clippers and I didn’t want to spend the $13. These fell apart the second my toddler got a hold of them. They were not gentle or smooth like the Freidas. I ended up tossing them and buying another freida
customer_reviews.author: robin snell

customer_reviews.title: Broke Instantly
customer_reviews.text: They snapped in half the first time I used them. It’s not like I’m Hercules. They’re just crappy. I didn’t return them because after shipping I would’ve gotten like a dollar back. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand for cutting my 3 and 5 year olds nails. I’ve tried others, but these work so well and are small for their little nails.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but that’s why I bought them
customer_reviews.text: One of the clippers broke the first time I used it, but I was able to fix it fairly easily. I don’t doubt that it will break again in the near future but I guess you get what you pay for. I do like how easy it is to hold the one w the big handle (that’s also the one that broke). I probably wouldn’t buy the set again but they’re a fine backup.
customer_reviews.author: Witchgreens

customer_reviews.title: Fair but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Decent clippers, one pair already broke after only using 2x, cheap but does the job, likely won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: First time went to use them the screw popped out and they fell apart. My husband put them back together and they worked ok just not great quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: Durable, works well, and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Would buy again if needed! Love that it is a set of 2. I can keep one in the diaper bag and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Bryana

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love the little clipper. The big clipper broke 30 seconds after opening the package. Luckily it was easy to reassemble. Good quality blades.
customer_reviews.author: C-Unit

customer_reviews.title: love these nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: best nail clippers I have ever bought. They are sharp and are able to cut nails really short. The large handle gives me good control over them and makes cutting my toddlers nails a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fingertip clipper
customer_reviews.text: Too easy to accidentally clip fingertips! The space between the clippers is just too tall (a larger opening than my adult clippers) and the clippers themselves are too sharp. I do not feel confident or safe using them and hesitate to even donate them knowing that whoever uses them would have the same problem. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Kahle

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the metal piece
customer_reviews.text: These are good enough. My complaint is that the metal piece holding together the big ones comes out super quick.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha R

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby and cat nails
customer_reviews.text: These nail clippers give you great leverage for cutting baby's paper thin nails. They also work well for cutting cat nails. The product is sturdy and built well.
customer_reviews.author: cajones8836

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler mom
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! My son is 2 and I have been using infant clippers. I used these last night and they work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heathelovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but stiffer
customer_reviews.text: Got this one because we lost our pink one that came in a kit. This ones a little more stiff but works just the same and I’m now only comfortable using these on my wiggle worms!
customer_reviews.author: Malory Leishman

customer_reviews.title: Still searching
customer_reviews.text: They were too sharp for my baby. I do not recommend these for any baby under 1.
customer_reviews.author: Articsha

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for 2 :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. The first one I bought with my first child almost 4 years ago, it still works perfectly, sharp as new. I got this set as a spear to have it in the car, diaper bag, house bathrooms :-) I have clippers everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.Sales

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great, safe, and I have a 1 year old that is more Wiley than a coyote when it comes to nail trimming. I've never cut him with these!
customer_reviews.author: Cheese Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Best nail clippers ever. Can hold onto them much better than standard ones. Bought a pair for baby and a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic hands
customer_reviews.text: My hands are arthritic and I had trouble finding easy to use nail clippers. These are great. They give me the gripping power to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bluejer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for 2 nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: These are oookay. Good price for 2 nail clippers. However, I don’t feel like they make a clean cut of the nail. If that makes sense. I have only found one baby nail clipper that works pretty well, and these are not my favorite. They work, but not extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Have loved these clippers for our twins since they were a few months old. Easy to use, good cut, only had one accident :( also love that they are an add on item.
customer_reviews.author: sct

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the regular clippers from the store. They’re super easy to use and it comes with two pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Crystyn N.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few sets to have laying around household. These will only last a few months before giving a cheap clip and flipping nails. Buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: The material quality seems a little cheap. Then again the price is really cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Rizan

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler fingers
customer_reviews.text: Great item for toddler nails. I’ve purchased many of these clippers and this one is one of the most gentle in little fingers.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We use these all the time, even adults. Its very comfortable grip to hold
customer_reviews.author: P. Borges-Hawes

customer_reviews.title: great to use
customer_reviews.text: first I thought maybe I'm wasting money, but I surely love these now. I even use this nail clipper for my older kids and myself. wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Singhal

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair that went missing, I liked that they came in a set of 2. Unfortunately, the larger pair (that we use most often) broke almost immediately. We’ve been able to fix it but it keeps popping apart and I’m afraid of losing small prices around our infant son.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hohorst

customer_reviews.title: Good qaulity
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I am terrified of always clipping my babies fingers as I did with my first born but then handle on this is so great!! It makes it so much easier to cut babies nails with.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as an amazon filler - otherwise don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Both are made of cheap metal and plastic. The larger one has already fallen apart once, they both make loud clicking sounds that scare my baby, and the smaller arrived with a chip in the chromeplated metal.
customer_reviews.author: IndigoRose1986

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use for babies and for bigger kids
customer_reviews.author: MonikaS

customer_reviews.title: I really like them but..
customer_reviews.text: I really like the clippers they are super easy to use and do the job well, but the one of them already broke which is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: birdy rivers

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for the baby's nails. Very cute color as well
customer_reviews.author: Tocha B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great little clippers for the price. I bought 3 sets so I could put some in each kids bedroom and each bathroom. Now, I always have clippers when I need them!
customer_reviews.author: elementaryteacher77

customer_reviews.title: Happy w purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me more control and confidence when trimming my little one’s nails. Happy w purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christen Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Good for newborns
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my newborn's and toddler's nails. They are very sharp and easy to hold. I like the two different handle designs as they allow you to clip from any angle. I use the smaller handled ones to clip my newborn's nails when she sits in my lap. I use the looped handled ones to clip my toddlers nails when she is sitting on a chair in front of me. These are great quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofTwo

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had had these for my first one
customer_reviews.text: They make cutting nails so much easier. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good
customer_reviews.text: These products break easily. I used them 2 different times and it just breaks apart.
customer_reviews.author: handofgod

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: They make the task of nail clipping so much easier. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, great price
customer_reviews.text: Seem like sturdy clippers, like the 2 different shapes. The bigger one definitely gives you more control.
customer_reviews.author: anthropos

customer_reviews.title: Love the handle
customer_reviews.text: These have fallen apart on us many times. Every time we put the pin back in and continue using them. The handle pair make baby nail trims sip much easier
customer_reviews.author: sino salmon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clippers!
customer_reviews.text: The pair with the hand loop on the bottom is amazing!!! They make it so easy to clip baby’s nails. I had originally got these as part of a set, but lost the clippers so I was so happy to see that they sold them individually!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Akinyi

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kid clippers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite child nail clippers. Work great. My fingers never slip. And cut well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tritten

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: They work great so far. We clipped our infants nails twice and these clippers have worked great both times.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schenck

customer_reviews.title: These have done a good enough job clipping nails but they are kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: These have done a good enough job clipping nails but they are kind of harsh. I don't even like using them on my nails because when they clip the nail, there's quiet a shock. But they are easy to handle and use.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli Ross

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Get the Red Cross ones instead.
customer_reviews.text: Does not cut. You have to use so much pressure it isn’t even worth it. When. You DO cut it cuts nothing like that you would think it would. Caused splitting in both my nails and my infants.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Krause

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: These make it super easy to clip my kiddo’s fingernails! (Except when they’re flailing around.)
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke after two uses. Probably a fluke because the first set we got was great
customer_reviews.author: Sean Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bigger one with some well the smaller didn't clip the nails..
customer_reviews.author: Tehilla R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold and easy to cut babies nails
customer_reviews.text: Was able to cut my infants nails and I feel confident I won’t cut her She is baby 6
customer_reviews.author: Bsmith

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I own a couple sets of these and love them, especially the one with the loop. One of my go to baby gift items!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best for babies. I use a different set for older toddler
customer_reviews.author: KirstenM

customer_reviews.title: Only the flat ones are worth it
customer_reviews.text: The flat pair are really sharp and cut my littles nails great! But the looped pair broke right away. I had to put them back together countless times and they are not nearly as sharp the other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good clippers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice clippers for children. The larger one makes it easier to clip nails of small children who struggle to hold still.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not quality that we were promised. The “hook” that holds both parts came off on the first rotation. Baby got ahold of it and it came off again.
customer_reviews.author: Kumarita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use handle.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They're sharp and easy to use. The closed handle set helps control the clippers, which is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive great nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive great nail clippers. The bigger one is perfect for keeping your hand steady to cut newborn fingernails. The smaller one is great for my toddler now that his nails are thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does a terrible job cutting nails pay the little bit more and get a better quality one
customer_reviews.author: trisha willett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: These are well made. They are not flimsy. I also like that they are easy to grip. The color is gender neutral which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: ilovedeals

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I cut my baby’s nails with these and only these!! It’s a must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So this came in handy as easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I fight with my little ones, to cut their nails. So this came in handy as easy to use, I feel safer with them.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I personally struggle with these but my husband loves to use them on our new born
customer_reviews.author: Raven Riot

customer_reviews.title: Work great, and they're cheap!
customer_reviews.text: We have several pairs of baby clippers, but I can never find them when I need them. These were inexpensive and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: BorrowedBlessings

customer_reviews.title: Easy clippers
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get the hang of the bigger clipper but overall they both work great and aren't difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dyvonne

customer_reviews.title: but the smaller pair works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: The larger clippers aren’t sharp enough to cut anything without pinching skin, but the smaller pair works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janell K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I dont have worry about hurting my daughters fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Much better than other nail clippers. I like this a lot and it's been really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Council

customer_reviews.title: The nail clippers are gentle and I can easily trim his nails and do not have without breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this to use on my newborn baby. The nail clippers are gentle and I can easily trim his nails and do not have without breaking the skin near the nails.
customer_reviews.author: N. T.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 1st use
customer_reviews.text: The nail clipper broke on the very first time we tried to use it, we couldn't even cut our toddler's nails. Very displeased, bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adeline J.

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Nice that it came with two
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Nice that it came with two, because we always misplace one!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Both sets snapped in half during first use. My husband was able to put the first one back together the first time it happened, but then it happened again
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set
customer_reviews.text: This set of nail clippers is perfect. It's very comfortable to use and I wish I had one in an adult size. The only feature I wish this set had would be a nail catching chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Sala

customer_reviews.title: ... little awkward to hold but the other pair are good and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The nail clippers with a loop handle are a little awkward to hold but the other pair are good and easy to use. Can't really bear the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mask

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They both have nice handles just wish they had a little bit of grip to them because my hands slip off sometimes. Very good deal though so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: brianna & andrew

customer_reviews.title: Tons of people swear by these
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but I give a 5 star because big of my best friends use them and swear by them.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is not accepting reviews on this product from this account
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I love these. Bought a set for myself and a friend with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Key

product_meta.title: Summer Nail Clipper Set, Teal/White
product_meta.description: The Summer Infant Nail Clipper Set includes both standard and infant sized clippers, making it great for the whole family. The standard nail clipper handle rotates 360 degrees for added control. The infant nail clipper has a rounded tip for safety.
feature_bullets: Two nail clippers: infant and adult size
Newborn nail clipper has rounded tip
Adult nail clipper is standard size, the handle rotates 360 degrees for more control
Handles have soft over-mold for comfort, helping to maintain a steady grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars589 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
